amendment.description: Amendment ensures that NSF-funded research is consistent with established and widely accepted scientific methods applicable to the field of study of exploration.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
